title: How Watching Your Thoughts Affects Your Weightloss
itunes:title: How Watching Your Thoughts Affects Your Weightloss
description:
Get the Free Course here:
http://phit.click/freecourse

In today's podcast I talk about a new way one of my members has come up with to stop herself from reactive eating. She takes a pause, drinks some water, and waits an hour to rethink how she reacts.
 
It's genius. Listen in to hear more.
